com.aionemu.commons.scripting
Class ScriptClassLoader

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.ClassLoader
      java.security.SecureClassLoader
          java.net.URLClassLoader
              com.aionemu.commons.scripting.ScriptClassLoader
Direct Known Subclasses:
ScriptClassLoaderImpl
public abstract class ScriptClassLoader
extends java.net.URLClassLoader

Abstract class loader that should be extended by child classloaders. If needed, this class should wrap another classloader.

Author:
SoulKeeper

libraryClasses

protected java.util.Set<java.lang.String> libraryClasses
Classes that were loaded from libraries. They are no parsed for any annotations, but they are needed by JavaCompiler to perform valid compilation

getByteCode

public abstract byte[] getByteCode(java.lang.String className)
